caption: Something worth seeing. Guide Juan was very good but difficult to keep up with his charming Spanish accent. Don’t expect to see a demonstration or any of the guard at all. Just a tour of the facilities and their horses.
I didn't personally food the museum very exciting, but the gallery where they train the horses is amazing!
Can be visited during open days only
I am feel a bit upset I had no oportunity for a proper translation ( I don't speak French )  But without a doubt for a horse lovers it is a place to be
A very small museum that you need to discover if you're around.

The “Caserne des Célestins”, that of the Republican Guard, is astonishing in its grandeur and calm. It has in fact settled on the site of a former convent, of which it retains the rectangular layout around a central courtyard. There is one of the three cavalry squadrons and the non-ranking squadron, made up of the cavalry band, farriers and the veterinary service. The public can visit a free museum of Traditions of the Republican Guard, with or without a guided tour.

To have gone there during the Open Days, it is a magnificent place of our heritage. I was able to visit the Stables to see the horses and their passionate riders. I was able to interact with the Maréchal craftsmen, helmet makers, saddlers. As a rider, I would have loved to be part of it despite all the constraints and military rigor that we have to assume. What a great job. Thank you all for welcoming us warmly. I regularly follow the news.  .
A place full of symbolism. Pleasant visit, mostly outdoors. Reservation required.

Visit on the occasion of heritage days. Very interesting explanations on the history of the Republican Guard and demonstration with multiple horses...just impressive!  Visit to the stables and the uniform museum. A great time! Thank you all
A superb day to discover the cavalry regiment of the Republican Guard. A very different view from the police.
Very interesting visit. Despite the nonchalance of the tourist guide to do it again. I recommend it to you
Visit during heritage days: very interesting, I highly recommend

Corps of National Officers intended for the protection of High Personalities of the Republic and protection during major Republican ceremonies. At the heart of this corps, the Mounted Republican Guard is even more prestigious and displays all its know-how during the presidential processions during the major parades on the Avenue des Champs-Elysées!

The Republican Guard in main "the Célestins barracks" has become my main cause of speech I talk about it much more than before I have been a rider there since the year 2021/2022 I still ride there until the age when I can. I really like all their horses, it allowed me to get to know them in real life and ride them. If you are lucky enough to live in Paris, reserve your next places for the heritage day, you will have the chance to meet this horse and many others!!
Great visit, very beautiful monuments, sublime horses.

Heritage Day For the first time we entered a military barracks. We visited the small museum of the history of the Republican Guards, visited the stables, watched the Farrier shoe a horse. Very pleasant day.

A must see. . Visit the museum then the stables.  On this occasion I met welcoming and warm staff.  And magnificent horses.  We want to give them a big hug. ...But it's forbidden. . Some were resting, others were being washed and pampered, while two others were doing exercises with their riders....

Superb visit to the Republican Guard via Cultival. A very attentive and kind welcome from gendarmes who are passionate about their exceptional place and their Republican Guard mission. What pride to travel within one of the most beautiful symbols of the French republic and its hierarchical organization. There is also a strong focus on the craft professions that accompany the life of the guard: farriers, feather workers, producers of swords or horse saddles... an exceptional moment that I highly recommend!

Impressive military building with a facade made up of heavy sculptures of lions, bosses imitating raw stone. One of the headquarters of the Republican Guard which rides horses, can be visited during heritage days, I remember seeing a farrier at work. The place also has a mini-museum.
very nice visit, surprising, informative

Visit on the occasion of heritage days, very interesting little museum. Magnificent horses, instructive discovery of all the trades revolving around it. The gendarmes present are proud enthusiasts and happy to present their profession. Thanks to them.
Take advantage of an open day (e.g. heritage days) to enter. Don't miss the farrier demonstration and the dressage demonstration. You can also see the stables

To be honest, I'm not sure what the building is... I don't even know if it's done every day... There are guards parading on horseback. Starting from this building and heading towards Ile Saint-Louis, the horses and guards were quite nice to see. It was especially fun to listen to the people going to the front as they played exciting music on instruments.
What a treat! if you can go visit don't hesitate. What majesty. The horses and riders are magnificent. The very pretty setting.
Republican Guard. Heritage Day 2023. Paris.

This prestigious institution is fascinating. This gendarmerie corps has emblematic Republican missions. The police officers who welcome you to the open days are very warm. They are admired by young and old alike.
Magical place of our French heritage. We cannot imagine that this state establishment is located on 4 hectares in the heart of our capital. To see and see again.
The cavalry! What beauty! Superb building too.

I had the chance to grow up until the age of 6 in the barracks of which I kept great memories including the presentation of a medal by President Valery Giscard d'Estaing to my father Maurice Gros who died at the barracks or he still has to walk the corridors and calm the horses on stormy evenings dad I love you! and every July 14 during the parade I think of you and your pride in being a Republican Guard!!!
Beautiful place, you can visit it, there are stables and a small museum open to the public, you can also find photos with Serbian soldiers to demonstrate the friendship between the two peoples...
Magnificent setting.  A living piece of Parisian history.  For all lovers of horses and Parisian culture.
A few years ago during heritage days, we visited the Republican Guard. The motorcycle ballet and horse show were sublime.
Very nice visit. Too bad the ride was closed for work. Magnificent horses.
Magnificent cavalry district. .a farm in Paris. . Absolutely worth visiting during heritage days or in groups
Beautiful 🤩 …
great place over all if you want to make it your future profession I was able to enter because I want to be and I was able to see the colonel's horse. I strongly recommend it :).
Very nice visit, with very beautiful horses
Very beautiful place I advise you to take with a guide
